short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On-page viewer of the WG market metrics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This mini extension displays floor prices and listings-count for various WG asset types, and adds market metrics for 1, 7 and 30 days under each relevant collection (WG, farmers, land & pouch).

Both elements can be enabled/disabled in the extension settings.
